"It still packs a wallop, this hard-edged play...What the sure-to-be Tony nominated director Kate Whoriskey has done with Nottageâ€™s words is to not shy away from the horribleness that can surface in all of our collective hearts...Even knowing the final outcome of 'Sweat,' the power and the discomfort is still epically visceral and disconcerting...But the very last scene still feels a bit heavy-handed and the one startling component that remains implausible and manipulative."
